entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
